content: Has anyone here ever tried to install Zulip (self-hosted)? Does anyone know if that's difficult? In the documentation it appears so easy - can this be true?
@indigoxela I've got it running here on a Digital Ocean droplet. Works a treat and didn't take long to install at all.

@indigoxela There's even a one-click install option https://marketplace.digitalocean.com/apps/zulip

Zulip Hosting | DigitalOcean Marketplace 1-Click App
Zulip is a full-featured team chat application with a conversation model designed to make good use of your time.
